amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to pay a performance award under section 5384 of title 5, United States Code, to any employee of the Internal Revenue Service.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to pay performance awards to employees of the IRS.
